notes: It is a living [[Fish]]. It will become an edible [[Fish]] when it dies.
history: Until the patch [[Updates/13.12.13018|13.12.13018]] [[Fish (Creature)]] could be convinced for 0 mana.
name: Fish (Creature)
bestiarytext: There are various types of Fish in Tibia. Ordinary Fish dwell in many lakes, ponds and of course Tibia's seas. They can be caught with a fishing rod or, once the ability of exploring the underwater worlds of Tibia has been acquired, be observed in their natural environment.
strategy: Just kill them, they drop dead pretty much right away.
